item.title: Increase font size on post timestamp
item.dc:creator: saivert
item.description:
Well it is a big of a deal because every time you necropost there comes a hoard of trolls trying to flame you to a crisp for doing so.

Just increasing the font size is easier and takes far less time than implementing smart-logic like what SimpleMachines has.

Even the font-size of posts themselves are bigger than the tiny timestamp.

Anyways I don’t care if poeple necropost. I don’t have anything against it. For one it means people are actually searching the forums. Most old threads are found via searches on google (I necroposted once because of this) or the forum search.
